mapper.select: select a.address_id as addressId, u.email, a.address, a.detail, a.zip_code as zipCode from address a join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into address(user_id, address, detail, zip_code) values((select user_id from user where email = #{email}), #{address}, #{detail}, #{zipCode});
